mapper.select: SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "PROGRM_FILE_NM" , REQUST_NO AS "REQUST_NO" , RQESTER_ID AS "RQESTER_ID" , CHANGE_REQUST_CN AS "CHANGE_REQUST_CN" , REQUST_PROCESS_CN AS "REQUST_PROCESS_CN" , OPETR_ID AS "OPETR_ID" , trim(PROCESS_STTUS_CODE) AS "PROCESS_STTUS_CODE" , to_char(PROCESS_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "PROCESS_DE" , to_char(REQUST_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REQUST_DE" , REQUST_SJ AS "REQUST_SJ" FROM ( SELECT rownum rn , TB.PROGRM_FILE_NM , TB.REQUST_NO , TB.RQESTER_ID , TB.CHANGE_REQUST_CN , TB.REQUST_PROCESS_CN , TB.OPETR_ID , TB.PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , TB.PROCESS_DE , TB.REQUST_DE , TB.REQUST_SJ FROM ( SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM , REQUST_NO , RQESTER_ID , CHANGE_REQUST_CN , REQUST_PROCESS_CN , OPETR_ID , PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , PROCESS_DE , REQUST_DE , REQUST_SJ FROM LETTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%' ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "totcnt" FROM LETTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM like '%'|| #{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "PROGRM_FILE_NM" , REQUST_NO AS "REQUST_NO" , RQESTER_ID AS "RQESTER_ID" , CHANGE_REQUST_CN AS "CHANGE_REQUST_CN" , REQUST_PROCESS_CN AS "REQUST_PROCESS_CN" , OPETR_ID AS "OPETR_ID" , trim(PROCESS_STTUS_CODE) AS "PROCESS_STTUS_CODE" , to_char(PROCESS_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "PROCESS_DE" , to_char(REQUST_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REQUST_DE" , REQUST_SJ AS "REQUST_SJ" FROM LETTHPROGRMCHANGEDTLS WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#{progrmFileNm} AND REQUST_NO =#{rqesterNo}
